# aha #

Look at Figure \@ref(fig:testing), it shows the output of a magic function.

```{r testing, fig.cap = "add two"}
library(TestPackage)
a <- add_2(seq(1:10))
plot(a)
```


Adding 2 to 4 we get `r add_2(4)`.


```{r }
paste(help(add_2))
```
